name: Looper
description: This algorithm is a looper based on the disting EX version but significantly extended. It supports up to four simultaneous loops with crossfades, fade-in/out, overdubbing, and synchronization to clock inputs or MIDI clocks. Features include loop reversal, half-speed playback (octave down), layers for undo/redo functionality, envelope controls for smooth transitions, and a two-button record/play/overdub paradigm. The looper can also generate clocks (analog/MIDI) and includes a dedicated MIDI-note interface for pedalboard integration. Memory usage depends on loop time, bit depth, and stereo/mono settings.
short_description: A looper with four independent loops, crossfades, overdubbing, clock sync, and MIDI control.
gui_description: The display shows loop states (empty, record, play, overdub, stop), loop length and position in seconds, envelope levels, and target loops with outlines. Icons indicate state: square for empty, circle for recording, triangle for playback, etc.

specifications.name: Memory impact
specifications.description: Stereo halves max loop time; 16/24-bit doubles it compared to mono 32-bit. Clipping possible in 16/24-bit modes.

specifications.name: Clock synchronization
specifications.value: Supports clock input, MIDI clock, or internal generation

specifications.name: Layers
specifications.description: Number depends on available memory and loop length. Minimum layers can be configured.

input_ports.name: Input left/mono
input_ports.description: Audio input bus for the left channel or mono signal (1-28). Default: 1.

input_ports.name: Input right
input_ports.description: Audio input bus for the right channel if stereo (1-28). Default: 2.

input_ports.name: Clock input
input_ports.description: Clock signal input bus when 'Clock source' is set to 'Clock input'. Range: 1-28. Default: 3.

output_ports.name: Output left/mono
output_ports.description: Audio output bus for the left channel or mono signal (1-28). Default: 13.

output_ports.name: Output right
output_ports.description: Audio output bus for the right channel if stereo (1-28). Default: 14.

output_ports.name: Trigger output
output_ports.description: Output bus for end-of-loop trigger pulses or clocks (0-28). Default: 0.
